Registry.description: An object that represents a container registry.

properties.description: The properties of the container registry.

RegistryCredentials.description: The result of a request to get the administrator login credentials for a container registry.

RegistryListResult.description: The result of a request to list container registries.

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next list of container registries.

value.description: The list of container registries. Since this list may be incomplete, the nextLink field should be used to request the next list of container registries.

RegistryNameCheckRequest.description: A request to check whether the container registry name is available.

name.description: The name of the container registry.

type.description: The resource type of the container registry. This field must be set to "Microsoft.ContainerRegistry/registries".

RegistryNameStatus.description: The result of a request to check the availability of a container registry name.

message.description: If any, the error message that provides more detail for the reason that the name is not available.

nameAvailable.description: The value that indicates whether the name is available.

reason.description: If any, the reason that the name is not available.

RegistryProperties.description: The properties of a container registry.

adminUserEnabled.description: The value that indicates whether the admin user is enabled. This value is false by default.

creationDate.description: The creation date of the container registry in ISO8601 format.

loginServer.description: The URL that can be used to log into the container registry.

storageAccount.description: The properties of the storage account for the container registry. If specified, the storage account must be in the same physical location as the container registry.

RegistryPropertiesUpdateParameters.description: The parameters for updating the properties of a container registry.

adminUserEnabled.description: The value that indicates whether the admin user is enabled. This value is false by default.

storageAccount.description: The properties of a storage account for the container registry. If specified, the storage account must be in the same physical location as the container registry.

RegistryUpdateParameters.description: The parameters for updating a container registry.

properties.description: The properties that the container registry will be updated with.

tags.description: The resource tags for the container registry.

location.description: The location of the resource. This cannot be changed after the resource is created.

StorageAccountProperties.description: The properties of a storage account for a container registry.

accessKey.description: The access key to the storage account.

name.description: The name of the storage account.

actions.title: Registries_CheckNameAvailability
actions.description: Checks whether the container registry name is available for use. The name must contain only alphanumeric characters, be globally unique, and between 5 and 60 characters in length.

actions.title: Registries_List
actions.description: Lists all the available container registries under the specified subscription.

actions.title: Registries_ListByResourceGroup
actions.description: Lists all the available container registries under the specified resource group.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group to which the container registry belongs.
The name of the resource group to which the container registry belongs.

registryName.description: The name of the container registry.

actions.title: Registries_GetProperties
actions.description: Gets the properties of the specified container registry.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group to which the container registry belongs.

registryName.description: The name of the container registry.

actions.title: Registries_Update
actions.description: Updates a container registry with the specified parameters.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group to which the container registry belongs.

registryName.description: The name of the container registry.

actions.title: Registries_CreateOrUpdate
actions.description: Creates or updates a container registry with the specified parameters.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group to which the container registry belongs.

registryName.description: The name of the container registry.

actions.title: Registries_GetCredentials
actions.description: Gets the administrator login credentials for the specified container registry.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group to which the container registry belongs.

registryName.description: The name of the container registry.

actions.title: Registries_RegenerateCredentials
actions.description: Regenerates the administrator login credentials for the specified container registry.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group to which the container registry belongs.

registryName.description: The name of the container registry.
